models.title: Lungs
models.description: Segment 9 segments: lung segments, pulmonary vein, pulmonary artery, lung vessels and trachea. Trained on TotalSegmentatorV2, ATM and PARSE datasets. In v1.x there are no pulmonary vein and artery segments but there is esophagus.
models.subject: human
